descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Heat forward Justise Winslow runs down Knicks guard Arron Afflalo and blocks his shot against the backboard.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Winslow volleyball spikes Affalo's layup attempt) 2015/11/23 ESHEET

videos.headline: Winslow volleyball spikes Afflalo layup attempt
